Now <color=#38b6c5>hold down the left mouse button</color>,
slowly get closer... closer...

Just wait until they return to the shallows...
Get close to them, <color=#38b6c5>left-click</color>, and snap!
In martial arts, speed is key! Why don't you give it a try?

The moment you <color=#38b6c5>release the left mouse button</color>,
SNAP! Down comes the pincer!

You'll be able to see
these little critters wiggling and squirming right in your hands.

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
Perfect timing! You've got the shellfish tongs!

Here's a Sani-style tip!
<color=#38b6c5>Hold down the left mouse button</color> and slowly approach your target,
Then <color=#38b6c5>release the left button</color> to quickly grab your target!

If you're <color=#38b6c5>sprinting with Shift</color>,
you can also instantly grab by <color=#38b6c5>pressing the left mouse button</color>.
<size=30>I'm pretty sure that's right, mhm!@</size>

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
You've got shellfish tongs!
Have you tried them yet? Have you tried them?

These little beach critters are surprisingly quick.
Don't rush, just <color=#38b6c5>chase after them</color>,
they'll tire out eventually.

Let's start with some easy creatures,
like floating <color=#97c344>sea urchins</color> and <color=#97c344>jellyfish</color>.
